overview: Merav Weinryb joined Pitango in April 2008, as a Senior Associate, dealing mainly with wireless and communication companies. Merav also serves as a member of the Advisory Committee to the Telecom Industries at The Israel Export and International Cooperation Institute. Prior to joining Pitango, Merav was an Associate VP for Corporate Development and Strategy in Comverse (NASDAQ:CMVT), a leading provider of software and systems enabling network-based communication and billing services. During her tenure in Comvrese, Merav initiated and participated in M&A activities and defined corporate strategy for new domains. Before joining the Corporate Development team, Merav held several product marketing and business development positions Prior to joining Comverse, Merav held several positions in different companies in Israel and in the Silicon Valley including Intel (NASDAQ: INTC), Emblaze (LSE: BLZ.L) and Chip Express. Merav holds a B.Sc. in Information Systems (cum laude) from the Technion, Israel’s Institute of Technology and an MBA from INSEAD, France.
